body.p:
Depending on the operating system, the agent are its configuration from different places:
Windows: configuration is stored in the registry at HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE/SOFTWARE/FusionInventory-Agent
MacOSX: the configuration file is in the .pkg package itself at FusionInventory-Agent.pkg/Contents/Resources/agent.cfg
UNIX/Linux: the configuration file is located at /etc/fusioninventory/agent.cfg
prebuilt: the “prebuilt” archive uses a agent.cfg configuration file located in the root directory of the archive.
